title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions:
Light up every throw with the TOSY Flying Disc — the ultra-bright, pro-weight LED disc that turns nights into highlights. Engineered to meet professional ultimate standards at 175 grams, it flies long, straight, and precise with a comfortable grip for confident catches and slick freestyle tricks.

Why you’ll love it:
- Dazzling LEDs: Up to 36 or 360 LEDs with 16 million RGB colors. It’s up to 100x brighter than typical light-up discs, so you can see it from incredible distances.
- Smart, effortless glow: Built-in motion sensors and Auto Light Up activate only when you play, conserving power and maximizing fun.
- Customizable play: Smart modes let you set brightness levels and timer modes to match your vibe—chill backyard toss or full-on night match.
- Quick-charge power: Recharge in just 30 minutes via the included USB-C to C cable. Get up to a thousand throws or a full 90-minute match on a single charge. (Charger not included.)
- Built for real play: Highly durable and waterproof for beaches, parks, camping trips, and late-night sessions. Perfect for disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes.

Gift-ready for men, boys, teens, and kids who love techy toys and outdoor action—ideal for Christmas, birthdays, or camping adventures. Make every catch a crowd-pleaser with the TOSY Flying Disc, the game-changing glow-up your nights have been waiting for.
